item.title: Crypto Workers Wanted
item.description: An analysis of a multi-stage macOS implant which shares a large number of commonalities with Lazarus’ Operation Interception.

item.title: About
item.description: hey! My name is alden (or birch) and I’m currently: CS undergrad @ UMD FIRE @ Yahoo (standard disclaimer: these thoughts are my own and do not represent those of my employer) VP and Competition Team Lead for UMDCSEC interested in malware, reverse engineering, threat intel the font used on this site is Berkeley Mono

item.title: Lazarus Using Leaked Hacking Team Tooling
item.description: A quick analysis of Lazarus sample which makes use of Hacking Team tools from the 2017 leak.

item.title: PizzaCrypt Analysis
item.description: A quick analysis of some fun .NET ransomware with a goofy ransom note.
